skills: Navigate in 2D space in the Scene view

options.text: Toggles between a 2D and a 3D view of the Scene.
Flattens the 3D GameObjects in the Scene to 2D Sprites.
In a 3D Scene, it makes the current Scene view look like 2D; in a 2D Scene, it does nothing.

feedbackCorrect: The 2D button can be very useful in a 2D or a 3D Scene. In a 2D Scene, toggle to 3D to see how GameObjects are ordered in the Z dimension. In 3D, toggle to 2D to line up GameObjects in one plane.
feedbackIncorrect: The 2D button can be very useful in a 2D or a 3D Scene. In a 2D Scene, toggle to 3D to see how GameObjects are ordered in the Z dimension. In 3D, toggle to 2D to line up GameObjects in one plane.
